verbose_text: IR thermographic images showed that the temperature at the tumor region can rapidly increase from ~ 33 degreesC to ~ 55 degreesC after intravenous injection of Cu 2 MnS 2 NPs (20 mg kg -1) under 1064 nm laser irradiation (0.6 W cm -2) within 3 min, which was capable of inducing sufficient local hyperthermia to kill tumor cells.
evidence: IR thermographic images showed that the temperature at the tumor region can rapidly increase from ~33 degreesC to ~55 degreesC after intravenous injection of Cu 2 MnS 2  NPs
